detaileddescription.para: nfs4_op_lookupp: looks up for the parent into theFSAL.
looks up for the parent into the FSAL.In NFSv4 this is to be used instead of "LOOKUP( '..' )" .

parameterdescription.para: [INOUT] Pointer to the compound request's data

simplesect.para: NFS4_OK if successfull, other values show an error.

detaileddescription.para: nfs4_op_lookupp_Free: frees what was allocared to handle nfs4_op_lookupp.
Frees what was allocared to handle nfs4_op_lookupp.

briefdescription.para: Routines used for managing the NFS4 COMPOUND functions.
